wikipedia_page.main: Melanie Jane Davies,  (born 8 July 1961) is a British physician and academic, who specialises in type 2 diabetes mellitus. Since 2007, she has been Professor of Diabetes Medicine at the University of Leicester.In the 2016 New Year Honours, she was appointed a Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE) "for services to diabetes research". In 2018, she was elected a Fellow of the Academy of Medical Sciences (FMedSci).
